text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for AAA gaming. The NVIDIA RTX 2080 in the GIGABYTE AERO 17 HDR YA-7US4450SQ 17.3" 4K/UHD 60 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 32 GB Memory 1 TB SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for streaming games is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2080. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The battery life is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the GIGABYTE AERO 17 HDR YA-7US4450SQ 17.3" 4K/UHD 60 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 32 GB Memory 1 TB SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Starfield and Fortnite. The build quality of the GIGABYTE AERO 17 HDR YA-7US4450SQ 17.3" 4K/UHD 60 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 32 GB Memory 1 TB SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the battery life is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Apex Legends and Call of Duty: Warzone. The build quality of the GIGABYTE AERO 17 HDR YA-7US4450SQ 17.3" 4K/UHD 60 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 32 GB Memory 1 TB SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the trackpad is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
